description:
This advanced seminar will examine the classical backgrounds to English poetry, in particular the Biblical and Greco-Roman antecedents to Renaissance lyric verse and verse drama (such as, preeminently, Shakespeare). Different versions of this course will have different emphases on Biblical or Hellenist backgrounds. 

See the English Department's website at www.english.upenn.edu for a description of the current offerings.
name: TPCS: CLASSICISM & LIT: Topics in Classicism and Literature:  Tragedy
